{{Location Intro|The '''Collective of Plenty Bulletin Board'''|description=<p>{{If Self|Collective of Plenty Bulletin Board|It|The Collective of Plenty Bulletin Board}} can be found at the southeast corner of the [[Grand Wrestling Grounds]]. The messages randomly cycle through every time "Continue Reading" is selected.</p>}}

==Content==
{{Dialogue Start}}
===Introduction===
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "This is the bulletin board for the Collective of Plenty. Tribal matters both great and small will be discussed here. Remember to check the board from time to time for the latest news."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "If you don't understand something written on the board, fell free to ask Chief [[Acatl]] directly. Don't be shy!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Anonymous Encouragement===
:'''Anonymous Message:''' "Children of Teteocan, hear my voice."
:'''Anonymous Message:''' "Do not be discouraged by setbacks, nor saddened by calamity."
:'''Anonymous Message:''' "The warm blood of the youth shall flow for the people, and by their 'power' shall the young defend you."
:'''Anonymous Message:''' "The noblest of souls will be sown as seeds of flame, to lend strength to the heroes who will set Natlan free..."
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

==='Grand Wrestling Extreme Championship' Advertisement===
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls, the highly anticipated showdown for the 'Grand Wrestling Extreme Championship' Belt is about to begin!"
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "For this competition, we will be welcoming a brand-new type of match &mdash; the '30-Man E-X-T-Reme Battle Royale'! 30 contestants will enter the ring one after the other, with their order being determined by their individual points rankings."
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "The last contestant standing after all the others have been eliminated will be crowned the Grand Wrestling Extreme Champion!"
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "As the saying goes, the wisest warrior is the one who shall laugh last. Then again, it's also said that the best-laid plans crumble in the face of absolute power!"
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "So, what kind of warrior will be the one left standing when the dust settles on the Grand Wrestling Grounds? Who will be the one who laughs last?"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Pilgrimage Announcement===
;(Available after completing {{Cx}})<!-- Incandescent Ode of Resurrection? -->
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "The new [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] is about to begin! The shining star of the training ground &mdash; {{Rubi|Uwezo|Power}} [[Iansan]] &mdash; will continue to lead the way!" 
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "As is tradition, the right to take part can be earned through victory in the Grand Wrestling Grounds. Warriors of the Collective of Plenty, we look forward to your fervent participation!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Additionally, we will be organizing transport to the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]] for those who wish to spectate. We hope that every tribesperson can show their enthusiasm, and cheer on our champions live at the venue itself!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

==='Grand Wrestling Ultimate Championship' Advertisement===
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "The strongest gladiator versus the strongest wrestler! Master and apprentice, who will win?"
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "In one corner we have a legend of the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, with an unblemished record, the strongest warrior &mdash; {{Rubi|Uwezo|Power}} Iansan!"
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "In the other corner, we have the undisputed 'Inferno Stomach Supremo,' protector of orchards, vanquisher of demons, and exemplar of wrestling strength &mdash; [[Varesa]]!"
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "A warrior's muscles never betray their hard work! Wrestling will guide the way to Teteocan's glory! May the best warrior win! The match to decide the 'Grand Wrestling Ultimate Champion' is about to begin!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Abyssal Invasion Tribute===
;(Available after completing {{Cx}})<!-- Incandescent Ode of Resurrection? -->
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Warriors of the Collective of Plenty, thanks to your hard work, the [[Abyss]]al invasion has been defeated, and our losses have been kept to a minimum."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' Special thanks must go to Varesa, whose prowess in combat was exemplary. Teteocan is proud to have a warrior such as you!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Even though the great enemy has been beaten back, this does not mean the threat is over. We cannot allow our diligent training to fade into lazy inactivity."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Warriors! For yourselves, for others, and &mdash; of course &mdash; for glory, we must continue to train hard, to turn our bodies into vessels of strength that will never crumble before any calamity!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

==='Grand Wrestling Grounds' Advertisement===
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "For our friends from afar, this round, empty space is known as the 'Grand Wrestling Grounds.' It is where wrestlers from the Collective of Plenty come to test their skills in competition."
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "We welcome those with unshakeable belief in their strength and skill to climb atop the stage and put their wrestling prowess to the test &mdash; to engage in a bout that pits strength against strength."
:'''Grand Wrestling Grounds Announcement:''' "Friends! Let us vie for the title of 'The Collective of Plenty's Strongest Wrestler'! Come to the Grand Wrestling Grounds and fight to be the best!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Volcano Safety Warning===
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Be careful around the volcano! Watch out for falling rocks! Make sure to protect your heads!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Thanks to inspections from the Observation Crew and other volunteers, it has become clear that the [[Great Volcano of Tollan]] has been becoming more active recently. Some areas have even experienced extreme weather phenomena, including burning biological rain!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "In order to ensure everyone's safety, please stick to wide, open, and reliable roads while traveling."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "It is especially important that members of the tribe do not become complacent and think they are immune from danger simply because they've seen it all before! We all know the importance of discipline when lifting weights. The same level of attention and care should be applied to the volcano!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)
{{Dialogue End}}
